text:
>> Thierry Coup: Well, let’s go look at some of those magical windows.
So another one of those awesome things

here at Diagon Alley™ is that you
as a wizard can come and practice your magic.

You can come to different windows,
different shops within Diagon Alley™

and follow a map that shows you where
there are special medallions

on the ground.
And each one of ‘em has a spell.

The spell is actually on the medallion itself.
You can see the shape

and the name of the spell.
>> Actor: Descendo [toilet flushing] swish

>> Alan Gilmore: Very impressive
>> ThierryCoup: Impressive
James and Oliver just did the U-No-Poo spell,

so let’s try something else for Bonnie.
>> Bonnie Wright: Tarantallegra

You can spend all day having fun with those
things and practicing and getting better and better.
